sense.def:
To smack someone
pomeni nekoga udariti z roko.

seg.quote: He smacked her on the bottom.
I gave him a smack in the face.

sense.def:
To smack something somewhere
pomeni postaviti ali vreči nekaj nekam tako, da se sliši glasen oster zvok.

seg.quote: He laughed, smacking the flat of his hand on the steering wheel.
She gave out the books, dropping them with a satisfying smack on each desk.
Any literature other than romantic novels smacked to her of school.
